general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs and resources available at Sharda University for the academic year 2025-26. It details offerings from the School of Dental Sciences, School of Medical Sciences & Research, and Sharda School of Nursing Science & Research. Additionally, it lists important university documents such as examination reports, the Academic Bank of Credits, curricula feedback, and the university brochure. The content also covers university information like perspective plans, leadership, history, statutory bodies, tenders, and legal documents. It highlights various skill enhancement and awareness initiatives, including language, soft skills, technological trends, and entrepreneurship. The document also mentions specific services like FM Radio, visa and insurance guidelines, mentoring portals, and COVID-19 updates, along with information about international campuses and courses on human values.
